channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Drawing huge crowds, Bernie Sanders steps into leadership of the anti-Trump resistance
Musk and Rubio spar with Polish minister over Starlink in Ukraine
item.description: The three went back and forth in an exchange of posts on X over Starlink being cut off in Ukraine.

item.title: Supreme Court turns away bid to block state climate change lawsuits
item.description: A group of Republican-led states sought to block lawsuits brought by a group of Democratic-led states that seek to hold energy companies accountable f...

item.title: Hamas is offering a truce with Israel for five to ten years, a U.S. official says
item.description: President Trump's hostage affairs envoy, Adam Boehler, says a new Israel-Hamas ceasefire deal could happen "within weeks," as he defends his direct ta...

item.title: House Republicans unveil spending plan with government shutdown deadline set for Friday
item.description: Republicans in the House released a stopgap spending plan over the weekend that would delay a government shutdown for at least six months, but it's un...

item.title: US says Ukraine 'ready to move forward' on truce demand
item.description: Ukraine is under US pressure to accept a quick truce to end the war with Russia, with US-Ukrainian talks set to begin in Saudi Arabia.

item.title: A single-engine plane crashes near a Pennsylvania airport and all 5 aboard are taken to hospitals
item.description: A single-engine airplane with five people on board crashed and burst into flames in a parking lot near a small airport in suburban Pennsylvania.

item.title: How the science of savoring can help you nurture your relationships
item.description: Learn this simple practice that researchers say can strengthen bonds with loved ones and improve your daily well-being.

item.title: Robert De Niro on playing a crime boss in "The Alto Knights"
item.description: Robert De Niro talks about his latest movie, "The Alto Knights," where he plays two rival crime bosses.

item.title: Hundreds of flights cancelled as strikes hit German airports
item.description: An unexpected nationwide strike by airport workers over pay has caused disruption at major transport hubs.

item.title: House Republicans propose plan to avoid shutdown. And, Canada's next prime minister
item.description: House Republicans unveiled a bill that has to be approved by Friday to avoid a government shutdown. And, what we know about Mark Carney, who won the l...

item.title: Why this week is important for Ukraine's future
item.description: Donald Trump believes Kyiv is now ready to "move forward" with a ceasefire with Russia. BBC News correspondent James Waterhouse explains what it means...

item.title: Immigration agents arrest Palestinian activist who helped lead Columbia University protests
Musk's Tesla facilities in US face 'Takedown' protests
item.description: It is part of an effort to protest the role Tesla's billionaire owner, Elon Musk, has played in the Trump administration.

item.title: A bane for tyrants abroad, U.S.-funded networks fear fate under Kari Lake
item.description: U.S.-funded international networks reach more than 420 million people in more than 100 countries each week. Some network leaders fear that Kari Lake i...

item.title: Does the narwhal's famous tusk help it catch fish?
item.description: Intriguing video of narwhals using their tusks to mess with fish has scientists speculating about what this behavior might mean.

item.title: Texas city's first foreign-born police officer turns trauma into triumph
item.description: Fidele Sebahizi escaped war in the Democratic Republic of the Congo, survived a refugee camp attack, and arrived in the U.S. with little English. Now,...

item.title: New Chinese tariffs add pressure on American farmers amid ongoing trade war
item.description: China's new tariffs on U.S. agricultural goods take effect today, cutting into American farmers' largest overseas market. The move follows the White H...
